title: Tata Power-DDL issues safety appeal ahead of Dussehra celebrations in Delhi
description: Tata Power-DDL issues a safety appeal ahead of Dussehra, cautioning Delhi residents against burning effigies near electrical installations. The company highlights fire and safety risks and is conducting a comprehensive inspection and maintenance drive to mitigate hazards, while promoting public safety and awareness through various campaigns.
